name: 趙莊敏
objective: 主要內容在介紹並探討變量間相互關係及建立模式的技術。討論的主題以財金實證研究中常用的分析模型為主，包括銀行效率的估算，隨機邊界法，資料包絡法，以及門檻值迴歸模型，分位數迴歸，馬可夫轉換模型等。
schedule:
週次　　授  課  內  容  要  項
1　　Introduction
2　　Structure of Economic Data: Cross Section, time series, and panel data
3　　Simple Regression Model
4　　Multiple Regression Analysis:Estimation
5　　Multiple Regression Analysis: Inference
6　　Multiple Regression analysis: OLS Asymptotics
7　　Multiple Regression Analysis: Further Issues
8　　Multiple Regression Analysis with Qualitative Information: Binary (or Dummy) Variables
9　　Heteroskedasticity
10　　More on Specification and Data Problems
11　　DEA Models: CCR Models
12　　BCC Models and Returns to scale
13　　DEA with Categorial DMUs, Super Efficiency Models
14　　Related DEA Research Papers
15　　Threshold Models
16　　Related treshold models Research Papers
17　　Quantile Regressions
18　　Related Quantile Regression Research Papers
scorePolicy:
課程互動：60%
期末報告：40%
materials:
1.Introductory Econometrics: A Modern Approach, 2nd ed., by Jeffery M. Wooldridge, 新月書局。
2.Introduction to Data Envelopment Analysis, by Cooper, Seiford, and Tone, Springer.
